text: North Weald railway station is a former London Underground station in Essex, England. It is between Epping and Blake Hall on the Central Line, serving North Weald. ==Other websites== *Epping Ongar Railway's Official Website *London's Abandoned Tube Stations - North Weald Category:Disused London Underground stations Category:1865 establishments in England Category:1994 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Epping Ongar Railway Category:Former single platform tube stations Category:1990s disestablishments in England
title: North Weald railway station
